text: class model restricted diffusion bundle cylinders.

title: Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
code: CylinderBundleCompartment$new(   axis,   radius,   diffusivity,   cylinder_density,   axial_diffusivity,   radial_diffusivity = axial_diffusivity * (1 - cylinder_density),   axis_concentration = Inf,   radius_sd = 0,   radial_model = c("soderman", "callaghan", "stanisz", "neuman", "vangelderen"),   voxel_size = rep(0.002, 3) )

title: Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
text: axis length-3 numeric vector specifying mean axis cylinder population. radius numeric value specifying mean radius cylinder population meters. diffusivity numeric value specifying diffusivity within cylinders m\(^2\).s\(^{-1}\). cylinder_density numeric value specifying density cylinders voxel. Must 0 1. axial_diffusivity numeric value specifying axial diffusivity space outside cylinders m\(^2\).s\(^{-1}\). radial_diffusivity numeric value specifying radial diffusivity space outside cylinders m\(^2\).s\(^{-1}\). Defaults axial_diffusivity * (1 - cylinder_density). axis_concentration numeric value specifying concentration cylinders along mean axis. Defaults Inf. radius_sd numeric value specifying standard deviation radius cylinder population meters. Defaults 0. radial_model character string specifying radial model use. Choices "soderman", "callaghan", "stanisz", "neuman", "vangelderen". Defaults "soderman". voxel_size length-3 numeric vector specifying size voxel meters. Defaults c(2e-3, 2e-3, 2e-3).

title: Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
code: CylinderBundleCompartment$get_signal(   small_delta,   big_delta,   G,   direction,   echo_time = NULL,   n_max = 20L,   m_max = 50L )

title: Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
text: small_delta numeric value specifying duration gradient pulse seconds. big_delta numeric value specifying duration gradient pulses seconds. G numeric value specifying strength gradient T.m\(^{-1}\). direction length-3 numeric vector specifying direction gradient. echo_time numeric value specifying echo time seconds. n_max integer value specifying maximum order Bessel function. Defaults 20L. m_max integer value specifying maximum number extrema Bessel function. Defaults 50L.

title: Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
text: numeric value storing predicted signal attenuation.

title: Cylinder bundle compartment class — CylinderBundleCompartment
code: cylinderBundleComp <- CylinderBundleCompartment$new(   axis = c(0, 0, 1),   radius = 1e-5,   diffusivity = 2.0e-9,   axial_diffusivity = 2.0e-9,   radial_diffusivity = 2.0e-10,   cylinder_density = 0.5,   radial_model = "soderman",   voxel_size = c(1, 1, 1) * 1e-3 ) cylinderBundleComp$get_signal(   small_delta = 0.03,   big_delta = 0.03,   G = 0.040,   direction = c(0, 0, 1) )

title: Plots a cross section of a cylinder bundle using ggplot2 — autoplot.bundle
text: object object class bundle generated simulate_bundle(). grid_size integer value specifying number points unit circle discretized draw spheres. Defaults 100L. ... Additional arguments passed ggplot2::autoplot() method.

title: Plots a cross section of a cylinder bundle using ggplot2 — autoplot.bundle
Plots a cross section of a cylinder bundle using ggplot2 — autoplot.bundle
code: density <- 0.9 voxel_size <- 0.000010 # 10 micrometers out <- simulate_bundle(density, voxel_size) ggplot2::autoplot(out)

code: if (FALSE) {   run_app() }

what: Generates a cross section of a cylinder bundle — simulate_bundle
title: Generates a cross section of a cylinder bundle — simulate_bundle
text: Generates cross section cylinder bundle given density voxel size. cross section generated simulating random distribution cylinders computing intersection cylinders plane. radii cylinders drawn Gamma distribution fitted data retrieved histology genu corpus callosum (Aboitiz et al., 1992). number cylinders determined density voxel size.

title: Generates a cross section of a cylinder bundle — simulate_bundle
code: simulate_bundle(density = 0.9, voxel_size = 1e-05, max_iter = 1000L)

title: Generates a cross section of a cylinder bundle — simulate_bundle
text: density numeric value 0 1 specifying density cylinders voxel. Defaults 0.9. voxel_size numeric value specifying size voxel meters. Defaults 1e-5. max_iter integer value specifying maximum number iterations simulation. Defaults 1000L.

title: Generates a cross section of a cylinder bundle — simulate_bundle
text: list following components: sections: tibble::tibble following columns: x: x-coordinates centers cylinders; y: y-coordinates centers cylinders; r: radii cylinders. voxel_size: size voxel meters.

title: Generates a cross section of a cylinder bundle — simulate_bundle
code: density <- 0.9 voxel_size <- 0.000010 # 10 micrometers out <- simulate_bundle(density, voxel_size)  # Actual density in the simulated substrate sum(out$sections$r^2 * pi) / voxel_size^2 #> [1] 0.7580024
